Context:
George Brown College is one of the Top 20 Canadian Acting Schools in 2021. The Theatre Arts students train and perform at the Young Centre for the Performing Arts in Toronto's Distillery District. The facility is a performance, training, and outreach centre with a size of 44,000 square-feet. It is shared with Soulpepper Theatre. Theatre Arts students perform at the Young Centre for the Performing Arts in their third and final year.

Auditions for George Brownâ€™s Theatre Arts program can be signed up for on the website. The contact details are 416-415-2000 and TTY: 1-877-515-5559, with emails at ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The information on the website is subject to change without notice.

The Young Centre for Performing Arts is back in-person for on-stage performances and the line-up for the 2023/2024 Season is available on the website. It is recommended to check regularly for updated production information and dates. The website also contains a section for land acknowledgment and offers opportunities to stay informed about application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more by signing up.
